help-file.title: PETS
help-file.content:
"Pets" are creatures who will permanently follow you and your orders unless you attack them or rent them off. You can aquire them in several different ways depending on what type of character you are. Some classes have the ability to "summon" pets. Others have the ability to "charm" a mob to make it a pet via an innate ability or a spell. One type of character can raise the dead to create pets. Finally, some classes are forced to purchase pets in pet shops located throughout the world.
NOTE: Your pet follow orders from you until you attack it, you rent or it dies. Warning: Some pets, when left alone, will instantly attack players when they enter a room. So, be careful where you leave your pets!
